幖字的基本解释

幖
biāo
古同“标”，标志。
幡：“立木为表系丝其上谓之幖。”
酒店的招子。
用文字或其它事物表明。
量词，用于书卷：“有书数千幖。”

幖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［biāo］
［《廣韻》甫遥切，平宵，幫。］
(1)标志，表明特征的记号。
(2)用文字或其它事物表明。
(3)通“縹”。犹卷。指书卷。
(4)用同“摽”。参见“幖幖”。

幖字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【巾字部】　幖； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页336第01
【唐韻】【集韻】【正韻】??遙切，音飇。【說文】幟也。【玉篇】幡也。【正韻】立木爲表，繫綵其上，謂之幖。　又【廣韻】頭上幟也。

biāo
The ancient same "standard", sign.
Banner: "The standing tree is the surface and the silk."
The hotel's tricks.
Use words or other things to indicate.
Quantifier, used in scrolls: "There are thousands of books."
Here
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［biāo］
["Guang Yun" cuts far away, Ping Xiao, help. ]
(1) A mark, a mark that indicates a characteristic.
(2) Use words or other things to indicate.
(3) Through "缥". Still roll. Refers to the scroll.
(4) Use the same "摽". See "幖幖".

[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Positive Rhyme]?? Remote cut, sound buzzing. [Said the text] Flag also. 【Jade articles】Fan also. [Positive rhyme] The standing wood is the table, and the color is on it.　[Guang Yun] The head is also on the banner.
